column2:
"Whew,
so now the forest is safe, meow!
...*blink, blink*"

"If not for us, it would
have been dangerous, meow!
...*blink, blink*"

"...um, with this, our stock should
go through the roof, meow. I'll try to go see Echo later, meow!"

"Thanks so much,
<%me>, meow!
I'll be counting on you again, meow."
